```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# E_mean od tau
# H od t
# E_k, V, P od t

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
df <- read.csv("5_1_out.csv", header = F)
colnames(df) <- c("t", "H", "V", "T", "P") 
head(df)
```

### Hamiltonian
```{r}
ggplot(df) +
    geom_point(aes(t, T)) +
    labs(x = "t [ps]", y = "H []", title = "Hamiltonian") + 
    theme_light()
```

### Temperature
```{r}
ggplot(df) +
    geom_point(aes(t, T)) +
    labs(x = "t [ps]", y = "T [K]", title = "Temperature") + 
    theme_light()
```


### Potential
```{r}
ggplot(df) +
    geom_point(aes(t, V)) +
    labs(x = "t [ps]", y = "V []", title = "Potential") + 
    theme_light()
```


### Pressure
```{r}
ggplot(df) +
    geom_point(aes(t, P)) +

```
